title: Video: Vondelpark – Dracula
content:
Vondelpark, in essence are a series of fragments, glimmers of youthful poignancy amongst a sea of distain and uncertainty. Dracula, the debut single from their 2013 R&S album Seabed, was their most accomplished tune to date. It all finally made sense. The sadness made sense, if that makes sense. The video is just as good, again we’re offered a sea of fragmented memories from, ‘that night’, or ‘those night’, almost just nights in general. Vondelpark have lived them and they’re sharing the parts they can remember.

Seabed drops in February via R&S.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
